example: There is tropical rainforest all over the Amazon Basin.
Farmers cut down trees at the end of the rainy season.
In the dry season they dry the trees and burn them.
After a few years the soil loses its nutrition.
They eat fish to get protein and they can even eat Piranha.
They use poisonous plants to make the fish unconscious.
The poisoned fish become unconscious and float to the top.
These islands are a World Natural Heritage site.
The government uses the money to protect the environment.
This is a traditional method of fishing in the Amazon.
